txt.en: You should raise heraldry of Gil-galad, Eryn Galen, and Lothlórien in Parth Daenath to intimidate the Enemy and boost the spirits of the soldiers.

'The banners of the Elves have oft struck fear into the hearts of our enemies, if they indeed have any! Take these and raise them throughout the Corpse-fields of Parth Daenath. Doing so will shake the courage of our foes and inspire the spirits of our friends.'
Celeborn can be found in Echad-in-Edhil.\n\nYou should talk to Celeborn.
'The banners now surround the lands of our enemies? It foreshadows the future, for soon it will be our armies that surround the foe and end the siege.'
Celeborn seeks to raise the heraldry of the Elves throughout Parth Daenath.
Raise heraldry of Eryn Galen in Parth Daenath ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Raise heraldry of Gil-galad in Parth Daenath ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Raise heraldry of Lothlórien in Parth Daenath ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
